content: Create a witty and humorous news headline that pertains to the impact of COVID-19 on the economy and the financial struggles of small businesses. The headline should incorporate recent statistics and data related to the pandemic's effect on unemployment rates and consumer spending habits. The tone of the headline should be lighthearted yet informative, drawing attention to the challenges faced by local communities and entrepreneurs during these uncertain times. Consider including puns or wordplay to add an extra layer of humor to the headline.
"Local Businesses Hope to 'Cash' COVID-19's Drift: As Unemployment Rates Get a Workout, Entrepreneurs Tighten Their Belts and Consumers Learn to Spend-tastic!"
